data.message: how to report a post that i suspecting being a virus?

replies.message: Hi there, Thomas. The best way to report abusive content on Facebook is by using the Report link that appears near the content you would like to report. For some examples and to learn more, visit our Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1O8avY4. -Kate
I've tried using Your help center but You never respond. My question is: Why am I not allowed to use the nickname my parents gave me on FB? But people ARE allowed to use FB to promote ISIS?
It dont matter, they wont delete it anyway.

And isn't just this ISIS stuff Facebook, I've been harassed and physically threatened on Facebook, I've reported it and I received automated responses that say "this does not violate our community standards". REALLY?  REALLY?  Female friends of mine have been sexually harassed and physically threatened by people, usually strangers, they report it and You tell them "this does not violate our community standards". What are You possibly thinking?  You have Your priorities completely backwards Facebook.  And You seem to have the time and resources to respond to so many other people on these post.....   It would be nice if You would respond to me...  For once.  I send You direct messages....  You do not respond.  I go to Your "Help Center" and voice my concerns and explain my confusion...  You do not respond.   Pathetic
